name: MasterEvad - RunBot
description:
First game made whith Unity for the Master of design and programming by EVAD School.

This is an endless runner, side-scrolling game in a futuristic  environment, with intelligent robots. Tje player, as RunBot, have to run has to run away, through a spaceship, getting as much information as possible, to deliver it to the last rebellious humans who want to end the invasion of robots.
